meaningMnemonic:
You feel your <kanji>ear</kanji> getting… <kanji>hit</kanji>? This is the feeling of a <vocabulary>whisper in</vocabulary> your <vocabulary>ear</vocabulary>; perhaps a secret, or some other confidential tidbit of information. Whatever it is it has impact, which is why it feels like a hit!

Note that this word is more often used in writing than in casual speech.
readingMnemonic: This word uses the kun'yomi readings for both kanji, but you know them both now, so you should be able to read this too!
